sense.name: position in football played by a team member
sense.examples: The tackles on their team all weigh over 250 pounds. The college tackle is a straight-A student.

sense.name: the football play of stopping a player's movement by throwing him down
sense.examples: The tackle of the quarterback is called a sack. The tackle of the running back apparently knocked the wind out of him.

sense.name: fishing gear
sense.examples: The sporting goods store had new fishing tackle on display in the window. John is an avid sports fisherman who has quite an assortment of tackle.

sense.name: block and pulley mechanism
sense.examples: The tackle on the boat's jib sail is showing signs of wear. Heavy objects were lifted up from the factory floor by means of a tackle.
